name: White Lily® Light and Fluffy Biscuits
author: White Lily
summary: These light and versatile biscuits come together so easily and are ready to eat in no time.
ingredients: 2 cups White Lily® Enriched Bleached Self-Rising Flour or White Lily® Enriched Unbleached Self-Rising Flour
directions: Cut in shortening with pastry blender or 2 knives until crumbs are the size of peas
Add buttermilk, stirring with fork just until flour is moistened
Turn dough onto lightly floured surface
Knead gently 5 to 6 times, just until a smooth dough is formed
Roll dough into a 7-inch circle that is 3/4- to 1-inch thick
Cut out 7 to 8 biscuits using a floured 2-inch biscuit cutter
Place on baking sheet, about 1-inch apart
(For softer biscuits, arrange so that edges almost touch
) Shape dough scraps into a ball
Bake 8 to 10 minutes or until golden brown
